meanings.definition: In a way that causes great surprise or wonder.
meanings.sent1: She sang amazingly well at the talent show.
meanings.sent2: The magician performed amazingly on stage.
meanings.sent3: The cat amazingly balanced a ball on its nose.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display was amazingly colorful and bright.

meanings.sent1: He amazingly finished the race in record time.
meanings.sent2: The team amazingly won the championship.
meanings.sent3: The cake was amazingly delicious, disappearing quickly.
meanings.sent4: The sun amazingly warmed the earth after a cold night.
meanings.sent5: The storm amazingly cleared up just in time for the picnic.
